title: FS: T3 Turkey Reds - S.C. Find (lower grades) ALL SOLD MORE TO COME. THX!
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Turkey Reds - S.C. Find (lower grades) ALL SOLD MORE TO COME. THX!
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Here are a dozen T3s from my recent find that I will sell raw.  These would probably grade PSA-1 or 2 (at best), so thought it best to save the grading fees.  These are guaranteed authentic and unaltered.  No trimming either.

Several people mentioned a chance to pick up some T3s that are visually appealing but technically lower grade.  Best of all inexpensive.  Here you go!

Happy to send front and back scans on any or all.

 7. Camnitz - creasing, writing on back, great colors and corners - SOLD
10. Devlin - 2 tiny pinholes otherwise VGEX, no creases -SOLD
17. Griffith - horiz creases, o/w VGEX+ and clean HOFer -SOLD
24. Mitchell - diagonal creases o/w EX -SOLD
25. McIntyre-Det - creases, indentation, nice colors - SOLD
28. McIntyre -B&C - small paper loss & stain, o/w VGEX - SOLD
32. Overall - diagonal crease o/w VGEX+ and clean - SOLD
41. Wiltse - MK f & b o/w nice VG+ SOLD
46. Safe at Third - horiz creases, MK back o/w EX - SOLD
48. Murray - horiz creasing o/w EX nice hard card - SOLD
105. Lobert - vertical crease o/w EX, ad-back -SOLD
110. McBride - tiny notch at top, tiny creases o/w EX - SOLD

Please feel free to ask any questions.  Respond here through the board, or email me directly at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]  

Thanks,
Craig
Can I reserve  both McIntyres  pending scans. I will also send an email. Thank you. Andrew Hahn
PM already sent earlier but can I reserve #7 and #10 pending front and back scans?  Thanks again, Michael

Request dibs on #7 if Michael is not interested. (pending review of scans)
Thanks, John

email sent earlier on Griffith, thanks,
Ian
Hi Craig, email sent on 32, 46, 48 and 105. Thanks.
Sending Email on 24,110 (reserve pending scans please)
Not sure how that worked...I had reserved 2 of the cards pending scans and unfortunately for me never heard back from the seller before they were "SOLD".  Don't believe anyone was before me:confused:

Michael,

Good morning.  I actually had two collectors contact me literally minutes after posting my list and bought the majority of the cards, including the two  you asked about.  That was very late last night and by this morning there were dozens of emails and PMs to respond to. I neglected to update the SOLD notes on the BST until I could respond to the emails.  Sorry about that.  I have several other T3s available and will see if I can find you one of those two or any others you may be looking for.

Best,
Craig
